home.title: Welcome to NextJs i18n
home.slogan: A Little Piece of Paradise in the Andes
home.description: A Hostel with a Difference: Our Warm and Friendly Approach Defines Us

infocards.title: Calm breakfasts
infocards.subtitle: Perfect Mornings on Our Patios
infocards.content: Start your days with a leisurely breakfast on our lovely patios. Enjoy the company of friends and family while savoring a variety of delicacies. A unique way to start your adventure in Cusco.

infocards.title: Explore and Discover
infocards.subtitle: Your Gateway to Machu Picchu
infocards.content: Staying with us not only gives you comfort, but also access to the wonders of Machu Picchu and other treasures of the region. Discover the cultural richness of Cusco with us.

infocards.title: Social Commitment
infocards.subtitle: Our Contribution to Cusco
infocards.content: At Hotel Qorichaska, we are committed to the community of Cusco. Find out how our actions benefit the city and its inhabitants, while you enjoy your stay with a cause.

infocards.title: Family Experience
infocards.subtitle: Unforgettable Moments with Friends and Family
infocards.content: At our hotel, we create special moments for you to enjoy with your loved ones. From leisurely breakfasts to exciting adventures, your experience will be memorable.

services.title: services
services.slogan: Qorichaska Hotel, a traditional and modern Hotel
services.description: Over 20 years of experience that is our guarantee

included.description: Enjoy a fast and reliable internet connection throughout your stay. Stay connected with your loved ones and share your adventures online.
Relax and rest in our comfortable beds. We ensure a restful night's sleep, leaving you refreshed each day.
Entertainment at your fingertips. Enjoy a wide selection of channels in your room and unwind after a day of exploration.
Rejuvenate with a hot shower anytime. Our facilities guarantee comfort and relaxation.
our peace of mind is our priority. We offer luggage security, allowing you to explore worry-free.
Our friendly and multilingual staff is ready to assist you. Communication without barriers for a hassle-free experience.
Travel light and worry-free. Safely store your luggage before arrival or after check-out.
We're available at all times to cater to your needs. Our reception is open 24/7 to provide continuous assistance.

optional.description: Explore worry-free. Our travel service helps you plan your adventures and excursions efficiently and safely.
Your well-being is our priority. We offer medical assistance to ensure you are taken care of in case of any eventuality.
You can book a variety of culinary options to satisfy your palate.
Maintain comfort in all seasons. Enjoy warm and cozy rooms, perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration.
Travel light and fresh. Our laundry service is at your disposal to keep your clothes pristine during your stay.
